meanings.definition: The central or most important feature or element.
meanings.sent1: The family photo was the centerpiece of the living room.
meanings.sent2: The flag was the centerpiece of the parade.
meanings.sent3: The cake was the centerpiece of the party, and everyone wanted a slice.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the centerpiece of her charm.
meanings.sent5: The diamond necklace was the centerpiece of her jewelry collection.

meanings.definition: An object placed in the center of a table as a decoration.
meanings.sent1: The floral arrangement served as the centerpiece for the dining table.
meanings.sent2: The candle holder was the centerpiece of the dinner table.
meanings.sent3: The fruit bowl acted as the centerpiece, tempting everyone with its colorful display.
meanings.sent4: The crystal vase stood tall as the centerpiece, catching the light beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The pumpkin carving was the centerpiece of the Halloween feast.
